title: Process a BOPIS Order
description: A customer has placed a 'Buy Online, Pick up In Store' (BOPIS) order. A store associate needs to prepare it.

tasks.description: Receive the new BOPIS order notification on the store's fulfillment device.
tasks.expected_outcome: The associate is alerted to a new order that needs to be picked from store inventory.

tasks.description: Pick the items from the sales floor and bring them to the pickup staging area.
tasks.expected_outcome: All items for the order are gathered.

tasks.description: Mark the order as 'Ready for Pickup' in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system automatically sends a notification to the customer that their order is ready.
